channel.title: Music – 켈리 클락슨(Kelly Clarkson)
channel.description: Recent content in 켈리 클락슨(Kelly Clarkson) on Music

item.title: 켈리 클락슨(Kelly Clarkson) - 9 to 5(FROM THE STILL WORKING 9 TO 5 DOCUMENTARY)
item.description:
(Nine to five)

Tumble out of bed and I stumble to the kitchen
Pour myself a cup of ambition
And yawn and stretch and try to come to life
Jump in the shower and the blood starts pumpin’
Out on the street, the traffic’s jumpin’
With folks like me on the job from nine to five(Mm, yeah)

Workin’ nine to five, what a way to make a livin’
Barely gettin’ by, it’s all takin’ and no givin’
They just use your mind and they never give you credit
It’s enough to drive you crazy if you let it(If you let it)
Workin’ nine to five for service and devotion
You would think that I would deserve a fat promotion
Want to move ahead, but the boss won’t seem to let me
I swear sometimes that man is out to get me(He’s out to get me)

(Nine to five) Nine to five
(Nine to five) Workin’, workin’, workin’(Nine to five)

They let you dream just to watch ’em shatter
You’re just a step on the boss man’s ladder
But you got dreams he’ll never take away(He’ll never take ’em away)
You’re in the same boat with a lot of your friends
Waitin’ for the day your ship’ll come in
And then the tide’s gonna turn and it’s all gonna roll your way(I just roll away)

Workin’ nine to five, what a way to make a livin’
Barely gettin’ by, it’s all takin’ and no givin’
They just use your mind and they never give you credit
It’s enough to drive you crazy if you let it(But you won’t let it)
Workin’ nine to five, yeah, they got you where they want you
There’s a better life and you dream about it, don’t you?(You dream about it)
It’s a rich man’s game no matter what they call it
And you spend your life puttin’ money in his wallet(Puttin’ money in his wallet)
Workin’ nine to five, what a way to make a livin’
Barely gettin’ by, it’s all takin’ and no givin’
They just use your mind, and they never give you credit
It’s enough to drive you crazy if you let it(Crazy if you let it)
Workin’ nine to five
Workin’ nine to five
It’s a rich man’s game no matter what they call it(Mm)
And you spend your life puttin’ money in his wallet(Puttin’ money in his wallet)

(Nine to five) Just workin’, workin’, workin’
(Nine to five) Just workin’, workin’, workin’
(Nine to five) And you think about it, don’t you?
(Nine to five) Yeah, you think about it, don’t you?
(Nine to five)
